hero-section.title: We Giving The Best
hero-section.subtitle: Experience to Watching Your Favorite Movie
hero-section.warning: *Check out the services we offer below. We're determined to provide these services at the best quality - customer satisfaction and convenience are of the utmost importance for us.

description.title: Explore the most popular titles by CineFX
description.description: Enjoy official and exclusive CineFlix titles, anywhere you are. Watch movies, series and more!

about.title: About
about.description-1: CineFX is a fictional video-on-demand service that allows our members to watch TV shows and movies on an internet-connected device.
about.description-2: CineFX can be accessed via web browsers or via application software installed on smart TVs, set-top boxes connected to televisions, tablet computers, smartphones, Blu-ray players, video game consoles and virtual reality headsets on the list of Netflix-compatible devices.
about.description-3: Stream unlimited movies and TV shows on your phone, tablet, laptop, and TV without paying more.
about.step-by-step-1: 1. Choose one of our available plans.
about.step-by-step-2: 2. Fill in your details and complete your registration.

pricing.title: Our Plans
pricing.description: No hidden fees, equipment rentals, or installation appointments.

table-1.feature-2: Stream on 1 screen at a time

table-2.feature-2: Stream on 2 screen at a time

table-3.feature-2: Stream on 3 screen at a time

pricing-2.title: Become a Reseller
pricing-2.description: Become an official CineFX reseller and enjoy great benefits on our platform.

questions.question-3: Why isn't the video starting at the beginning?
questions.question-5: How good is CineFX for kids?

answers.answer-1: CineFX is a fictional video-on-demand service that allows our members to watch TV shows and movies on an internet-connected device.
answers.answer-2: Edge, Chrome, Firefox, Safari and Opera.
answers.answer-3: Make sure your browser is updated correctly. Restart your device and try again, if it persists, please contact us.
answers.answer-4: Yes. Wherever you are, you only need a device with internet access to access our platform.
answers.answer-5: Some of our content has an indication of age, however, we also have profiles for children, which guarantees total security when accessing the content.
